Description: Heavy duty asphalt — fire apparatus routing (Zone A); 150mm HMA on 300mm granular; includes geogrid and geofabric
SourceRef: Paving_Surfacing_Rates.csv PS-01; Qty per Assumed_Project_Parameters.csv PP-10 (0.5 ac fire routes) + ASM-003
Notes: Rate includes base prep per PS-01 notes. Area assumes ~0.5 ac per PP-10 converted to m2 and rounded.

Description: Light duty asphalt — parking near main structure (Zone B); 75mm HMA on 200mm granular; includes geofabric
SourceRef: Paving_Surfacing_Rates.csv PS-02; Qty per Assumed_Project_Parameters.csv PP-10 (0.8 ac parking) + PP-19 (40 stalls) + ASM-004
Notes: Rate includes base prep per PS-02 notes. Area from PP-10 ~0.8 ac = ~3237 m2 rounded to 3200.

Description: Aggregate surfacing — heavy equipment yard areas (Zone C); 150mm crushed gravel compacted per layer
SourceRef: Paving_Surfacing_Rates.csv PS-03; Qty per Assumed_Project_Parameters.csv PP-10 (1.5 ac yard/storage) + ASM-005
Notes: PS-03 rate covers 150mm. Spec REQ-03-03-05 anticipates 300mm minimum. See L-004 for second lift.

Description: Aggregate surfacing — second 150mm lift for 300mm total depth (Zone C)
SourceRef: Paving_Surfacing_Rates.csv PS-03; ASM-006 (300mm minimum per Spec REQ-03-03-05 assumption)
Notes: Second lift to achieve 300mm minimum anticipated by Specification. Rate same as PS-03.

Description: Concrete aprons — main building overhead doors (8 doors); 200mm reinforced; sulphate-resistant mix
SourceRef: Paving_Surfacing_Rates.csv PS-04; Qty per PP-13 (8 doors) x 4.88m wide x 8m deep + ASM-007
Notes: 8 doors x 4.88m x 8.0m = 312 m2. Apron depth (8m) is assumed per ASM-007. Dimensions TBD pending PKG-002 architectural.

Description: Concrete aprons — cold storage overhead doors (2 doors); 200mm reinforced; sulphate-resistant mix
SourceRef: Paving_Surfacing_Rates.csv PS-04; Qty per PP-14 (2 doors) x 4.88m wide x 8m deep + ASM-008
Notes: 2 doors x 4.88m x 8.0m = 78 m2. Dimensions TBD pending PKG-004 architectural.

Description: Concrete curb and gutter — barrier type; parking area perimeter
Notes: Estimated perimeter of parking area. Actual length depends on DEL-03-01 site plan.

Description: Concrete sidewalk — accessible routes from parking to main entrance; 100mm broom finish
Notes: Accessible route from parking to main building entrance. Length/width TBD from site plan.

Description: Parking lot line painting — stall lines and fire lane markings
Notes: 40 stalls x ~5.5m line + ~200m fire lane markings. Rounded to 450 lm.
3 accessible stalls assumed per Alberta Building Code for 40-stall lot.

Description: Steel bollards — concrete-filled; painted; at overhead doors and building corners
Notes: Standard practice at overhead doors/corners/fuel areas. Count TBD from site plan.

Description: Geosynthetics allowance — biaxial geogrid for heavy duty asphalt (Zone A); supplemental to PS-01 rate
SourceRef: ASM-014; rate based on typical geogrid supply+install $6-$10/m2
Notes: PS-01 notes say 'includes base prep' but geogrid may not be fully included. Conservative allowance. See ASM-014.

Description: Geosynthetics allowance — woven geofabric for light duty asphalt (Zone B); supplemental to PS-02 rate
SourceRef: ASM-015; rate based on typical geofabric supply+install $3-$6/m2
Notes: PS-02 notes say 'includes base prep' but geofabric may not be fully included. Conservative allowance. See ASM-015.

Description: Geosynthetics allowance — woven geofabric for aggregate yard (Zone C); separation layer at subgrade
SourceRef: ASM-016; rate based on typical geofabric supply+install $3-$6/m2
Notes: Geofabric separation layer between subgrade and aggregate. Not included in PS-03 rate. See ASM-016.
